name: There is a Light That Never Goes Out
name_original: There is a Light That Never Goes Out
description:
Headphones strongly recommended!

Use left & right arrow keys.

For Win/Mac/Linux downloadables, check out the Gamejolt page.

For he who passes the gateways always wins a shadow, and never again can he be alone.

There is a Light That Never Goes Out is a short game exploring the feeling of being paralysed by old memories, doubts and habits that prevent you from starting a new life. An experience of fear and anxiety, where it is up to the player to figure out how to redeem the control over their personal life.

A game by
